archimate:DataObject.name: Credential Exchange Layer
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The Sovrin Infrastructure Layer for Credential Exchange. As the SSI ecosystem matures, additional human trust-building protocols may appear at this layer, such as protocols for staking, reputation sharing, or insurance. See Appendix G.
